title: Wrong loglevels

labels.name: bug
labels.description: A problem with current functionality, as opposed to missing functionality (enhancement)

labels.name: frozen-due-to-age
labels.description: Issues closed and untouched for a long time, together with being locked for discussion

body:
Since that new logging stuff has been merged I get debug messages; also the logflags are ignored by these debug messages:

```
Okt 10 22:57:38 alderaan syncthing[2479]: [TYZZZ] INFO: Skipping folder dokumente scan due to folder error: insufficient free space
Okt 10 22:57:44 alderaan syncthing[2479]: [TYZZZ] INFO: Skipping folder dokumente scan due to folder error: insufficient free space
Okt 10 22:58:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 22:58:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 22:59:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 22:59:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:00:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:00:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:01:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:01:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:02:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:02:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:03:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:03:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:04:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:04:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:05:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:05:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:06:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:06:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
Okt 10 23:07:27 alderaan syncthing[2479]: 2015/10/10 23:07:27 ProtocolClient@0xc822a72fc0 received message protocol.Ping
```
